DOC.brief_summary: The objective study investigate effect GLP-1 analogue Victoza® psoriasis double-blinded , randomized placebo-controlled clinical trial .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Glucagon Like Peptide ( GLP ) -1 Psoriasis
DOC.criteria: Caucasians 18 year age Plaque psoriasis PASI score > 10 No treatment stable treatment psoriasis least 3 month inclusion Steady weight 3 month body mass index ( BMI ) 27 kg/m2 Normal blood pressure Spiral hormonal birth control fertile woman entire treatment period least 3 day end treatment period ( ~5 time plasma halflife ) Psoriasis arthritis Fasting plasma glucose > 7.5 mmol/L HbA1c > 7.5 % Type 1 diabetes Treatment type 2 diabetes GLP1based medicine ( DDP4inhibitors GLP1receptoragonists ) Heart failure , NYHA class IIIIV Uraemia , endstage renal disease , cause impair renal function screatinine > 150 µM and/or albuminuria Liver disease ( alanine amino transferase ( ALAT ) and/or aspartate amino transferase ( ASAT ) > 2 x upper normal serum level ) Anaemia Acute chronic pancreatitis Struma thyroid cancer Pregnancy breast feeding Inability complete study
